Class Television

java.lang.Object
Television
public class Television extends Object
Class containing the logic to make a TV work.
Author:
Agatha Owora

  • Constructor Details

    • Television

      public Television()
      Constructs a default TV object. Default values: channel = minimum value, volume = minimum value, TV is off.

  • Method Details

    • getChannel

      public int getChannel()
      Method to get the current TV channel.
      Returns:
      current TV channel.

    • setChannel

      public void setChannel​(int channel)
      Sets a new channel for the TV. The channel can only be adjusted when the TV is on and the range is valid.
      Parameters:
      channel - new TV channel.

    • getVolume

      public int getVolume()
      Method to get the current TV volume.
      Returns:
      current TV volume.

    • setVolume

      public void setVolume​(int volume)
      Sets a new volume level for this TV. The volume can only be adjusted when the TV is on and the range is valid.
      Parameters:
      volume - new TV volume.

    • isOn

      public boolean isOn()
      Checks the TV status.
      Returns:
      false if the TV is off and true if the TV is on.

    • setOn

      public void setOn​(boolean on)
      Turns the TV on or off.
      Parameters:
      on - value to turn the TV on/off.

    • channelUp

      public void channelUp()
      Increases the TV channel number by 1. Nothing happens when one goes beyond the maximum channel.

    • channelDown

      public void channelDown()
      Decreases the TV channel number by 1. Nothing happens when one goes below the minimum channel.

    • volumeUp

      public void volumeUp()
      Increases the TV volume level by 1. Nothing happens when one goes beyond the maximum volume.

    • volumeDown

      public void volumeDown()
      Decreases the TV volume level by 1. Nothing happens when one goes below the minimum volume.

    • details

      public String details()
      Displays the state of the TV. If the TV is on display output in the format TV details: Channel = 5, Volume = 2. If the TV is off display output in the format TV details: TV is off, Channel = 1, Volume = 1.
      Returns:
      the channel and volume details of the TV.
